# üìâüí∞ **Bitcoin Price Drop Alert Workflow**

This automated workflow checks the current Bitcoin price and **sends an email alert if it drops by 5% or more** compared to the last recorded value. It‚Äôs split into 3 easy-to-understand sections:

---

## üîé **Section 1: Fetch the Current Bitcoin Price**

üß© **Nodes:**

1. **‚ö° Manual Trigger**
2. **üåê Fetch Bitcoin Price**
3. **üß± Extract Price**

### üß† What Happens:

* **‚ö° Manual Trigger**
  This starts the process manually. Think of it like pressing a "Start" button.

* **üåê Fetch Bitcoin Price**
  Uses the [Bright Data API](https://brightdata.com/) to scrape the live Bitcoin price from a specific website using a POST request.

* **üß± Extract Price**
  Extracts the **exact price value** from the scraped HTML using selectors (like CSS paths).

### üí° Why It‚Äôs Useful:

You can track the **real-time price** of Bitcoin straight from any public site, even those not offering official APIs. It's like building your own live feed.

---

## üìä **Section 2: Calculate and Compare with Historical Price**

üß© **Nodes:**
4\. **üîÑ Convert Type**
5\. **üìó Get Last Recorded Price (Google Sheet)**
6\. **üìâ Find Drop Percentage**

### üß† What Happens:

* **üîÑ Convert Type**
  Converts the price from a text format to a number so we can calculate with it.

* **üìó Get Last Recorded Price**
  Pulls the **previous Bitcoin price** from a Google Sheet (a record from last check). Acts like your ‚Äúmemory‚Äù.

* **üìâ Find Drop Percentage**
  Calculates how much the price has dropped:

  $$
  \text{Drop (\%)} = \frac{\text{Previous Price - Current Price}}{\text{Previous Price}} \times 100
  $$

### üí° Why It‚Äôs Useful:

You‚Äôre comparing real-time data with past values automatically‚Äîno spreadsheets or calculators needed! This makes it ideal for **traders or enthusiasts** watching for price alerts.

---

## üö® **Section 3: Send Alert if Drop ‚â• 5%**

üß© **Nodes:**
7\. **üîÄ If droppercentage >= 5**
8\. **üìß Send Alert Email**
9\. **‚û°Ô∏è No Alert Needed**

### üß† What Happens:

* **üîÄ If Statement**
  Checks: Has the price dropped by **5% or more**?

* **üìß Send Alert Email** (if true)
  Automatically sends an email to notify you about the drop. This could go to your inbox, or a team.

* **‚û°Ô∏è No Alert Needed** (if false)
  The workflow ends quietly without doing anything else.

### üí° Why It‚Äôs Useful:

It **only alerts you when it matters**, saving your attention for big changes. You don‚Äôt need to monitor prices all day.
